snippet: Andras Schiff”s recital at Zankel Hall on Wednesday night featured no fewer than 63 miniatures, including 4 encores.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews recital by pianist Andras Schiff as part of his Perspectives series at Zankel Hall. Photo (M)
lead_paragraph: Zankel Hall Bartok called the 153 piano pieces he compiled in six books between 1926 and 1939 ''Mikrokosmos.'' It was the same subject of little worlds -- by Bartok as well as by Bach, Beethoven, Kurtag and Jörg Widmann -- that the pianist Andras Schiff explored on Wednesday evening in a dense, masterly, exhausting, gorgeous recital at Zankel Hall.
